about_the_game:
Zen Cube a game where your hobby will be your greatest fun.
The Zen cube arose from the idea of the Zen Chess game that allows the player to perform only the checkmate of the chess move, with the Zen Cube you can make the last 2 moves to finish the Magic Cube.
detailed_description:
Zen Cube a game where your hobby will be your greatest fun.
The Zen cube arose from the idea of the Zen Chess game that allows the player to perform only the checkmate of the chess move, with the Zen Cube you can make the last 2 moves to finish the Magic Cube.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04.5 LTS – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4, Intel Core or AMD Athlon – 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000/4000, NVIDIA GeForce 8600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 2400 – 256MB VRAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04.5 LTS – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4, Intel Core or AMD Athlon – 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000/4000, NVIDIA GeForce 8600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 2400 – 256MB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: El Capitan
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Quad Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Sierra
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Quad Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 450
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Zen Cube

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Quad Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000/4000, NVIDIA GeForce 8600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 2400 – 256MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Quad Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000/4000, NVIDIA GeForce 8600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 2400 – 256MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Zen Cube a game where your hobby will be your greatest fun. The Zen cube arose from the idea of the Zen Chess game that allows the player to perform only the checkmate of the chess move, with the Zen Cube you can make the last 2 moves to finish the Magic Cube.
